situation: I can't figure out why my friends don't understand why I want to keep a bit distant during COVID

rewrite_iterations.rewritten_text: It's completely understandable to feel torn between options! You could start by suggesting the group video hangout to gauge everyone's interest, and if that goes well, plan some one-on-one calls afterward to discuss things more personally.
rewrite_iterations.reasoning: The original response exhibited an empathy-only approach without providing practical help, which is a violation. I added a brief empathy sentence and provided a concrete short guide to help the seeker navigate their decision.
